Specimen Type: Formalin-fixed paraffin-embedded (FFPE) tissue blocks or unstained slides
Purpose: To perform the technical analysis of the Synovial Sarcoma Panel to ensure accurate, consistent, and reliable detection of synovial sarcoma markers.
Container: FFPE tissue block or positively charged microscope slide
Equipment: Microtome, automated immunostainer or manual staining set-up, microscope, incubator, water bath
